snippet: The hometown favorites and defending champions Marissa Castelli and Simon Shnapir held a huge lead after the pairs short program at the United States figure skating championships in Boston.
abstract: Marissa Castelli and Simon Shnapir hold a huge lead after the pairs short program at the United States figure skating championships in Boston.
lead_paragraph: The hometown favorites and defending champions Marissa Castelli and Simon Shnapir held a huge lead after the pairs short program at the United States figure skating championships in Boston.

headline.main: Defending Skating Champions Take Big Lead
